Dough Sheeter



Dough sheeter is trusted in our daily living. It can be noticed frequently in bakeries as well as factories. But do most people really know dough sheeter? What on earth is dough sheeter? What include the functions of dough sheeter? What are the differences between common money sheeter and Bossda money sheeter equipment? Today, letâ€™s find there questions together.

Dough sheeter makes use of imported raw materials, robust and durable, electric clean production process intuitive and reliable, crisp reasonable epigram, high efficiency, easy to apply. Non-stick surface, not easy to scratch, fast swiftness, low noise.

1. The key function of the dough sheeter machine should be to make the dough to the flakest even layers by way of repeated rolling. It is soft and in some cases effect, professional for the particular production of pastry, egg cell tart, pastry, Danish bread and various kinds of pastry meals.
